page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN DEIGHTON
page.content: {I.C.I}is the biggest chemical firm in the area.From Deigton School we can see many pipes,chimneys,offices and large constructions.The firm employs 100's of people and covers about a square mile of land.We often see yellow and red smoke pouring out.{L.B {Hollidays}also produce chemicals but the buildings look ordinary and do not take up as much space as the I.C.I.The firms are built next to each other along the banks of the River Colne and the Ramsden Canal.The Deighton area is a busy area for industry employing hundreds of people.{Batleys}is a place where you buy things cheaper in bulk for a firm that you own.{Ellis And Booth}sell wood if you went to look there you would see masses of timber. Paul Spivey Deighton High School July 1985.
